titles: A proclamation, for a publick general fast throughout the kingdom of Scotland. At Edinburgh, the eight day of August, one thousand six hundred and sixty five years.
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,
notes: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Signed: Pet. Wedderburne, Cl. Sti. Concilii.
Imperfect: stained with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Fasting --  Religious aspects --  Christianity --  Early works to 1800.
